job_history.work_description: Administered payroll through ADP payroll system. Benefit coordination and administration Employee Purchases through pay data batch entry Maintained sick leave and attendance programs. Developed new process for employee evaluation which resulted in marked performance improvements. Researched and updated all required materials needed for firm and partners. Analyzed departmental documents for appropriate distribution and filing. Assisted various business groups with document organization and dissemination during acquisitions. Obtained documents, clearances, certificates and approvals from local, state and federal agencies.

Payroll Verified licensure Compliance coordination per Federal and State regulations for nursing requirements. Produced legal documents, including contracts and real estate closing statements. Researched statutes, decisions, legal articles and codes. Investigated facts and law of cases, using pertinent sources to determine causes of action and to prepare cases. Analyzed client balance sheets for auditing purposes. Contacted clients to schedule appointments and discuss the progress of cases. Conducted background investigations on the defendant.

The Enrollment Coordinator processes applications for, changes to, reinstatement of, and cancellation of insurance policies. Verifies eligibility requirements to meet Department of Insurance and Medicare regulations along with standards set by the organization for Individual, Medicare and commercial groups enrollees. Analyze data received from various sources, to ensure accuracy of the claims and billing system.

Generated and submitted invoices based upon financial schedule. Ensured invoices and check requests for our location were processed efficiently and accurately. Generated accounts payable reports for management review. Utilized talents and expertise when conducting monthly closing processes, journal entries, and accruals. Entered all invoices requiring payment via check or bank draft. Performed administrative tasks such as recordkeeping, writing correspondence and gathering materials. Successfully implemented new technologies and process automations to encourage continuous improvement. Supervised invoice processing, purchase orders, expense reports, credit memos and payment transactions.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Administered payroll through ADP payroll system and handled payroll-related tasks in multiple roles, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Coordinated compliance efforts per Federal and State regulations, and verified licensure, showing strong proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed data received from various sources to ensure accuracy of claims and billing systems, and analyzed departmental documents for distribution and filing, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Document Management
skills.explanation: Assisted with document organization and dissemination, and maintained records, showing a solid working proficiency in document management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised invoice processing and implemented new technologies and process automations, indicating some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Accounts Payable
skills.explanation: Generated and submitted invoices, ensured efficient and accurate processing of invoices and check requests, and performed administrative tasks, showing a solid working proficiency in accounts payable.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Successfully implemented new technologies and process automations to encourage continuous improvement, indicating some practical experience in process improvement.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Contacted clients to schedule appointments and discuss case progress, and wrote correspondence, indicating some practical experience in communication.
